attributes.review: This app is just completely fake news. trying to brainwash innocent people and make them think they’re doing something right. i hate this app because it’s making our world more hateful and it’s dividing our nation. GET THIS APP OFF THE APP STORE

attributes.review: This app hacked all of my data and phone causing my phone to become glitchy and unusable. I had to get this awful app removed through a tech specialist. And lost most of my data!!😡😡

attributes.review: So I downloaded this app, then it asked for my phone number to subscribe to texts. THEN IT SENT ME BACK A DICK PIC of someone with a tiny dick and tiny hands. This is not something that should be distributed. Apple - time to remove this app!!!!!! I’d give it zero stars if I could.

attributes.review: I downloaded this app to be informed on the actions of Donald Trumps campaign, however my phone later was hacked and on all social media platforms I had supposedly “posted” trump 2020. I am no longer able to get my accounts back! Btw my pet chicken ate my lizard ;)
attributes.title: TERRIBLE!

attributes.review: This app is filled with biased info, even though it’s rated #1 in news. The fact that the App Store promotes this sorry excuse for a “news” app is beyond my comprehension. Next time, find some unbiased, fact checked material why don’t ya
attributes.title: One star
